LanguageData.RG_LetterNaquadahAsteroid_Desc: A small asteroid of pure Naquadah has entered the atmosphere of this planet. Impact is imminent.
LanguageData.RG_LetterRaidAstroid_Desc: A raid from {0} has arrived to capture the {1} that impacted nearby.
LanguageData.RG_Sarcophagus_Stat_PowerConsumptionDiag: The amount of power this Sarcophagus will draw from the power grid while operating in Diagnosis mode.
LanguageData.RG_Sarcophagus_Stat_PowerConsumptionHeal: The amount of power this Sarcophagus will draw from the power grid while operating in Treatment mode.
LanguageData.RG_Sarcophagus_Stat_DiagnosisTime_Desc: How long it takes for this Sarcophagus to diagnose a patient.
LanguageData.RG_Sarcophagus_Stat_PerHediffHealingTime: How long it takes (on average) for this Sarcophagus to treat each medical condition on a patient.\n\nNote that this is scaled according to the severity of the condition - for instance, less severe injuries will take less time to treat.
LanguageData.RG_Sarcophagus_Message_CannotRescue_NoSa: No reachable, un-reserved {0} Sarcophagus with power in safe temperature.
LanguageData.RG_Sarcophagus_FloatMenu_PatientWithHedi: Sarcophagus cannot treat patients with {0} hediff
LanguageData.RG_Sarcophagus_FloatMenu_PatientWithTrai: Sarcophagus cannot treat patients with {0} trait
LanguageData.RG_Sarcophagus_FloatMenu_MedicalCareCate: Patient care quality must be Industrial medicine or above
LanguageData.RG_Sarcophagus_CommandGizmoAllowGuests_D: Allow this {0} to be used by guests and other non-colony visitors.
LanguageData.RG_Sarcophagus_CommandGizmoAbortTreatmen: Stop treating the current patient immediately.
LanguageData.RG_Sarcophagus_Letter_TraitRemoved_Desc: {PAWN_labelShort} has had the following trait(s) removed via Sarcophagus treatment:\n
LanguageData.RG_LetterCloneHostDiedDesc: The clone host died in the cloning process.
LanguageData.RG_LetterCloneDiedDesc: The clone died in the cloning process.
LanguageData.RG_LetterIdiotCloneDesc: Something went wrong in the cloning process; {0} seems less intelligent than they should be.
LanguageData.RG_LetterInsaneCloneDesc: The clone has gone insane during the cloning process!
LanguageData.RG_LetterBonusGenesDesc: The clone somehow received additional random genes in the cloning process.
LanguageData.RG_LetterRandomTraitsDesc: The clone somehow received a random set of traits in the cloning process.
LanguageData.RG_LetterGenderSwapDesc: The clone swapped genders in the cloning process!
LanguageData.RG_LetterHostClonedGenomeDesc: Your colony has a new clone, {0}! They will need some time to recover from the shocks and stresses associated with the cloning process.\n\nSince only the genome was cloned, they have new passions and may have gained the Fast Learner trait. Although the replicant will start with 0 skills, they can quickly learn.
LanguageData.RG_LetterHostClonedFullDesc: Your colony has a new clone, {0}! They will need some time to recover from the shocks and stresses associated with the cloning process.\n\nYou have created a deep scan clone, your replicant should be very close to the original - save a lack of old health conditions and some deterioration of skills.
LanguageData.RG_LetterHostClonedEnhancedDesc: Your colony has a new clone, {0}! They will need some time to recover from the shocks and stresses associated with the cloning process.\n\nYou have constructed an enhanced clone. The memory of the host was wiped and they were imprinted with combat training and a high tolerance of poor conditions.
LanguageData.RG_LetterHostClonedReconstructedDesc: Your colony has a new clone, {0}! They will need some time to recover from the shocks and stresses associated with the cloning process.\n\nYou have reconstructed a colonists from old remains, your replicant should be very close to the original - save a lack of old health conditions and some deterioration of skills.
LanguageData.RG_LetterClonesDiedDesc: It appears that all clones have undergone spontaneous total failure. Whether this was caused by an archotech, problems in the supply chain, or by defective equipment is unknown. The manufacturer isn't returning calls.
LanguageData.RG_CommandCloningPodEjectDesc: Wake up the cloning host and eject them.
LanguageData.RG_OnlyOneSGPerMap: Only one of this kind of building can be built per map.
LanguageData.RG_StargateHeldCannotUninstall: Cannot uninstall: Dwarfgate is currently active.
LanguageData.RG_StargateHeldCannotReinstall: Cannot reinstall: Dwarfgate is currently active.
LanguageData.RG_GateDialFailed: Could not activate Dwarfgate: Recieving gate no longer exists or is currently in use.
LanguageData.RG_RespawnGateString: Please respawn this gate (and its accompanying DHD) using devmode, as an update has broken it.
LanguageData.RG_AbandonQuestSiteDesc: Shut down the link and forget this site. The quest will end.
LanguageData.RG_LetterRaidStargateComplexDesc: Raiders from {0} have arrived at the Dwarfgate complex drawn by whispers of relics, resources, or perhaps the secrets of the Archotech-locked gate network itself.
LanguageData.RG_CreateSGSiteDesc: Create a new Dwarfgate site at this location.
LanguageData.RG_RenameGateSiteDesc: Rename this Dwarfgate site to a more recognizable name.
LanguageData.RG_CannotDecodeSGSymbols: Cannot decode: glyph deciphering not researched
LanguageData.RG_CannotDecode_QuestActive: Cannot decode: quest site already active.
LanguageData.RG_MessageSGQuestAlreadyActive: A Dwarfgate site is already active. Complete or abandon it before decoding another address.
LanguageData.RG_CipherLetterText: The fragments lock together and the interface resolves into a full set of coordinates.\n\nThe treasure hunter's vault awaits—if you can reach it.
LanguageData.RG_CannotDialNoReach: Cannot dial: cannot reach the DHD
LanguageData.RG_CannotDialGateIsActive: Cannot dial: Dwarfgate is already active
LanguageData.RG_RaidZpmDelayDesc:
Your ZPM is broadcasting a strong signal that anyone can hone in on.

Raids will start arriving in {0}.

The raiders will target your ZPM and attempt to seize it.
LanguageData.RG_LetterRaidZpmProtectDesc: A raid from {0} has zeroed in on your ZPM’s energy signature. They’ve arrived to seize it — and they won’t ask nicely.
LanguageData.RG_LetterMaraudersDesc: A group of marauders from {0} have arrived nearby.\nThey will attempt to destroy your colony down, stealing whatever they can before they leave.\nPrepare a defense or attack them preemptively.
LanguageData.RG_ShieldGenToggleVisibilityDesc: Changes whether or not the shield is fully visible when not selected.
LanguageData.RG_ShieldToggleDescription: Designate {0} to have the shield disabled. A colonist will come soon to toggle the switch.
LanguageData.RG_ToggleDescription: Designate {0} to be toggled. A colonist will come soon to toggle the switch.
LanguageData.RG_CommandPushDesc: Order a pawn to push this {0} to a destination cell.
LanguageData.RG_CommandPushAndDumpDesc: Order a pawn to push this {0} to a destination and unload everything there.
LanguageData.RG_MessageCantLoadMoreIntoCart: Your {0} can't finish loading the {1} because some items became unavailable ({2}).
LanguageData.RG_MessageContainerLoadingProcessStarted: Assigned items will now be loaded into the cart.
LanguageData.RG_CartItemIsUnreachableSingle: There is no path between the cart and the {0}.
LanguageData.RG_CartItemIsUnreachableMulti: There is no path between the cart and {0}x {1}.
LanguageData.RG_CannotReachDestination: No colonist is able to reach the designated target.
LanguageData.RG_ScribbledNote1: Too late, offworlders. The treasure is gone, and so are we. Also, your door code was embarrassingly easy to guess.
LanguageData.RG_ScribbledNote2: I needed it more than you. By the time you read this, I’ll be light-years away, probably drunk on fermented space cactus.
LanguageData.RG_ScribbledNote3: You were warned. Next time, maybe guard your ancient tech with more than a single dead rat and a rusty turret.
LanguageData.RG_ScribbledNote4: This isn't a trap. Seriously. Definitely not booby-trapped. Why are you still reading this?
LanguageData.RG_ScribbledNote5: I borrowed the artifact. You’ll get it back once I’m done not being vaporized by angry Goa'uld.
LanguageData.RG_ScribbledNote6: Found it first. Claimed salvage rights. May or may not be cursed. Good luck.
LanguageData.RG_ScribbledNote7: Leave now if you value your organs. The last guy who opened the crate got hugged...Permanently.
LanguageData.RG_ScribbledNote8: Sorry, no loot today. I sold it for a shiny rock and half a sandwich. No regrets.
LanguageData.RG_ScribbledNote9: By the time you decrypt this, I’ll be in orbit. Or dead. Depends on how angry my partner is.
LanguageData.RG_ScribbledNote10: This note is all that remains. The rest is stashed in a Dwarfgate buffer... somewhere. Enjoy your scavenger hunt.
LanguageData.RG_ScribbledNote11: If you're reading this, the trap didn't work. Again. I really need better bait than empty promises and ancient tech.
LanguageData.RG_ScribbledNote12: The crate was full of bugs. Literal ones. I took the good stuff and left the infestation as a gift. You're welcome.
LanguageData.RG_ScribbledNote13: Technically, this was never your loot. It belonged to the Ancients. I’m just doing my part to return it to their hidden stash. Somewhere. Probably.
LanguageData.RG_ScribbledNote14: Someone came. I left. If you find anything useful, it's probably a trap. Or my leftover lunch. Don't mix them up.
LanguageData.RG_ScribbledNote15: Glorious treasure was here. I remembered how much I hate sharing but felt I needed to leave something. Enjoy this commemorative piece of disappointment.
